summary: An Ordinance providing for the improvement of Wilson Avenue, from Holly Street to Grattan Street; Holly Street, from Wilson Avenue to 57th Avenue South; and 57th Avenue South, from Holly Street to Morgan Street; all in The City of Seattle, all in accordance with Resolution No. 6864 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment by Bonds".
